thread.title: Small rooms yes but also cozy and quiet.
thread.title_full: Small rooms yes but also cozy and quiet. - Review of Pod 39 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: KEMCanada
title: Small rooms yes but also cozy and quiet.
text: The Standard Pod was indeed small but it was advertised as such so I was not surprised. I was surprised however to find everything I could possibly need in the room. Who needs more floor space? The hotel was super quiet....I got a great sleep each of my 3 nights there. Location was terrific. The concierge (Christina?) was really friendly and helpful. Take advantage of the free walking tours as well.
